title: Beautiful Beachfront 5 Bed Luxury Villa in Plai Laem
description:
- 5 Bedroom, 6 bathroom luxury oceanfront villa
- Elevated position with private gated beach access
- Situated in the exclusive Bayside beachfront estate
- 3 storey contemporary architecture
- Stunning ocean views from all rooms
- Fully furnished to an exceptional level
- High-quality of finishing throughout
- Infinity-edge oceanfront private pool
- Expansive covered terrace area
- Travertine stone tiling throughout outside terraces 
- Outdoor Sala seating & BBQ area
- Sumptuous materials & design
- Indoor and outdoor dining areas
- Open-plan living/dining/kitchen 
- Fully-equipped designer kitchen
- Brand name built-in appliances
- Separate laundry room
- Solar panels to reduce electricity costs
- Separate staff kitchen and maidï¿½s room with en-suite 
- Fully managed & maid service
- Built in air-conditioning
- Ceiling fans in all rooms
- Private garage for 2 cars
- Land: 1000 sqm approx.
- Villa: 800 sqm approx
- Freehold tenure
- Chanote land title
